title: Conversations About Urban Street Colloquialisms Pt. 1
itunes:title: Conversations About Urban Street Colloquialisms Pt. 1
description:
Glasses and co. tackle the perceptions of street culture and those who desire that lifestyle. Is being a "lame" uncool? Are the lines blurred? Joining in the conversation are friends of the show, Pavy and TPJ from the Hoops N Brews podcast. 

Rate, subscribe, comment and share.

Follow NC on IG

@GlassesLoc

@Peter_Bas_Boss 

@HoopsNBrews

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
